entry.title: Tuesday: Blowing snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind north 50 km/h becoming northwest 30 this afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
